description: Serious solar protection that doesn't compromise on style, the Crater Lake™ Long Sleeve Hoody has you covered whenever and wherever the sun catches you out in the open. Designed with Mountain Hardwear's lightest-weight UPF 50+ fabric and a full-coverage hood, the Crater Lake works as a stand-alone top on bluebird beach days and river trips, or as a highly breathable baselayer hoody for spring skiing and sunny high-alpine travel.
name: Mountain Hardwear Crater Lake Hoody - Mens
